meanings.definition: A boat propelled by steam power.
meanings.sent1: The steamboat glided gracefully across the river.
meanings.sent2: We took a relaxing ride on the steamboat during our vacation.
meanings.sent3: The steamboat seemed to dance on the water with its steamy breath.
meanings.sent4: The steamboat chugged along like a giant iron dragon.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the steamboat's whistle echoed through the valley.

meanings.sent1: We decided to steamboat down the river for a unique experience.
meanings.sent2: Many people used to steamboat for long distances before modern transportation.
meanings.sent3: I can't wait to steamboat my way to the next town!
meanings.sent4: She steamboated across the lake as the sun began to set.
meanings.sent5: Steamboating through the misty morning was a magical journey.

meanings.definition: A steam-powered vessel used for transportation.
meanings.sent1: The old steamboat was a marvel of engineering in its time.
meanings.sent2: Cargo was transported up the river by the steamboat.

meanings.sent4: The steamboat cut through the waves like a knife through butter.
meanings.sent5: Passengers enjoyed the luxurious amenities on the steamboat.
